sentences.en: A trumpeter swan glides across the surface of the Yellowstone River.
sentences.cn: 一只号手天鹅正游过黄石河的水面.

sentences.en: Always obey park rangers, officials, and park employees, and enjoy your Yellowstone experience!
sentences.cn: 永远听从公园流浪者, 官员, 和公园的员工, 并享受您的黄石经验!

sentences.en: At Artist, you will take pictures of Yellowstone's magnificent Lower Falls.
sentences.cn: 在“写生台”, 你们可以拍摄一些黄石公园壮丽的“下瀑布 ” 的照片.

sentences.en: At the bottom you'll see Yellowstone River winding through the colorful canyon.
sentences.cn: 在峡谷底部,你将看到黄石河穿梭在五彩缤纷的峡谷中.

sentences.en: Betty was frightened, but she also had many wonderful experiences at Yellowstone Park.
sentences.cn: 贝蒂当时吓坏了, 但她在黄石公园也有许多美好的经历.

sentences.en: Bison dot a Yellowstone snowscape, some sweeping the drifts aside with their heads to uncover vegetation.
sentences.cn: 黄石公园雪景上点缀著一些野牛.有些正埋头刨出被盖住的植物.

sentences.en: The best part of Yellowstone lies in the northwest of Wyoming.
sentences.cn: 黄石公园的大部分坐落在怀俄明州的西北部.

sentences.en: The high mountains around Yellowstone are covered with evergreen forests.
sentences.cn: 黄石湖周围的高山上布满了郁郁葱葱的丛林.

sentences.en: The snowcoach concept in Yellowstone provides low-impact, low-pollution access.
sentences.cn: 在黄石公园里使用雪车这一想法，为人们提供了一种对环境低影响、低污染的游览方式。

sentences.en: The valley of the Yellowstone River has beautifully coloured rocks and three large waterfalls.
sentences.cn: 黄石河大峡谷有色彩艳丽的岩石和三个大瀑布.

sentences.en: There are over 1,000 miles of trails around Yellowstone.
sentences.cn: 黄石公园的周围大约有一千英里多的小道.

sentences.en: Yellowstone has everything which appeals to the romantic.
sentences.cn: 黄石公园具有吸引追求浪漫之人的一切.
黄石是一块神奇的土地.

sentences.en: Yellowstone is more than a collection of scenic features and natural curiosities.
sentences.cn: 黄石绝不仅仅只是特色风貌和自然景观的集成.

sentences.en: Yellowstone Park has many areas with hot springs and geysers or hot water fountains.
sentences.cn: 黄石公园许多地方都有温泉,间歇泉和热水喷泉.

phrases.tran_cn: 黄石国家公园（美国第一个国家公园）
黄石河（河流名，位于美国西北部）
